Introduction
============

This is theme for Plone 4 implemented with Diazo


Changelog
=========

0.10 (2014-09-22)
-------------------

- renamed folder_listing to folder_view

0.9 (2014-09-20)
-------------------

- css and javascript dependencies updated and collection form fixed.

0.8 (2014-09-19)
-------------------

- adds drag and drop feature to folderish pages

0.7 (2014-09-19)
-------------------

- adds folder_listing view to collections

0.6 (2014-09-18)
-------------------

- add footer functionality footer portlet manager

0.5 (2014-09-17)
-------------------

- Remove implementation to automatically add a slideshow. Knowledge moved to collective.mediaShow


0.4 (2014-09-16)
-------------------

- Adds slideshow automatically to folderish media pages if collective.mediaShow is being used 

0.3 (2014-09-16)
-------------------

- Moved event knowledge to automatically create a slideshow folder to collective.mediaModern

0.2 (2014-09-15)
-------------------

- Added event to create automatically a slideshow folder inside MediaPage

0.1dev (unreleased)
-------------------

- Initial release
